datadog.description: Datadog MCP server — exposes metrics, traces, logs, monitors, dashboards, and service catalog data to AI agents.

tools.name: list_monitors
tools.description: List all monitors with optional filtering by tag, service, or status.

tools.name: get_monitor
tools.description: Get detailed information about a specific Datadog monitor, including thresholds, query, and notification settings.

tools.name: search_traces
tools.description: Search for APM traces matching a query, with filters for service, resource, duration, and status.

tools.name: get_trace
tools.description: Retrieve a specific distributed trace with all spans, tags, and metadata.

tools.name: query_metrics
tools.description: Query Datadog metrics with aggregation, grouping, and time range parameters.

tools.name: search_logs
tools.description: Search logs using Datadog query syntax with facets, filters, and time range.

tools.name: list_services
tools.description: List services from the Datadog Service Catalog with metadata, ownership, and dependencies.

tools.name: get_service_summary
tools.description: Get an APM service summary — latency percentiles, error rate, request volume, and deployment info.

tools.name: list_dashboards
tools.description: List available dashboards with optional search and filtering.

tools.name: get_slo
tools.description: Get SLO status, error budget, and history for a specific Service Level Objective.

tools.name: create_monitor
tools.description: Create a new Datadog monitor with query, thresholds, and notification configuration.

tools.name: mute_monitor
tools.description: Mute or unmute a monitor, optionally scoped to specific tags.
